2:

Text: Andraé Crouch:  In secular music, he was known for his collaborative work during the 1980s and 1990s with Stevie Wonder, Elton John and Quincy Jones as well as conducting choirs that sang on the Michael Jackson hit "Man in the Mirror" and Madonna's "Like a Prayer".
Triplets:<Andraé Crouch
4:
--------------------
Text: Andraé Crouch:  His efforts in this area helped pave the way for early American contemporary Christian music during the 1960s and 1970s.
